meanings.definition: The act of striking the palms of the hands together with a sudden explosive sound.
meanings.sent1: The children's clapping echoed through the room.
meanings.sent2: The audience erupted in clapping after the performance.
meanings.sent3: The clapping of the seals at the zoo made everyone smile.
meanings.sent4: The clapping of thunder signaled the approaching storm.
meanings.sent5: Her enthusiastic clapping could be heard from afar.

meanings.sent1: The loud clapping filled the concert hall.
meanings.sent2: The clapping continued long after the speech ended.
meanings.sent3: The clapping of the audience was music to the performer's ears.
meanings.sent4: The clapping of the waves against the shore was soothing.
meanings.sent5: The thunderous clapping showed the crowd's appreciation.
